attributes.action: Cut NHS funded GP’s salary to £10/h
attributes.additional_details: With practices closed for normal appointments, GPs are doing telemarketers job by answering/making phonecalls and working on a computer - it’s a perfect definition of telemarketing.
attributes.background: Cut salary of all NHS funded practices/GPs to a £10/h range if they keep their door closed for patients.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want all GP salaries to be limited, or only when providing online healthcare to patients
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
